targets.rawSql: SELECT COALESCE((SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(tr.ts) > NOW() - INTERVAL '15 minutes' THEN 'ok' ELSE 'stale' END FROM timeseries_readings tr JOIN points p ON tr.point_id = p.id WHERE p.bacnet_device_id IS NOT NULL), 'stale') AS value
SELECT EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (SELECT MAX(tr.ts) FROM timeseries_readings tr JOIN points p ON tr.point_id = p.id WHERE p.bacnet_device_id IS NOT NULL))::bigint * 1000 AS value

SELECT tr.ts AS time, p.external_id || ' (dev ' || p.bacnet_device_id || ')' AS metric, tr.value FROM timeseries_readings tr JOIN points p ON tr.point_id = p.id WHERE $__timeFilter(tr.ts) AND p.bacnet_device_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY tr.ts ASC

SELECT tr.ts AS time, p.external_id AS metric, tr.value FROM timeseries_readings tr JOIN points p ON tr.point_id = p.id WHERE $__timeFilter(tr.ts) AND p.site_id::text = '$site' AND p.bacnet_device_id = '$device' ORDER BY tr.ts ASC

panels.title: Single point (select site + device + point above)

targets.rawSql: SELECT tr.ts AS time, tr.value FROM timeseries_readings tr JOIN points p ON tr.point_id = p.id WHERE $__timeFilter(tr.ts) AND p.site_id::text = '$site' AND p.bacnet_device_id = '$device' AND p.external_id = '$point' ORDER BY tr.ts ASC

list.name: site
list.query: SELECT s.name AS __text, s.id::text AS __value FROM sites s WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM points p WHERE p.site_id = s.id AND p.bacnet_device_id IS NOT NULL AND COALESCE(p.polling, true) = true) ORDER BY s.name

list.name: device
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT bacnet_device_id AS __text, bacnet_device_id AS __value FROM points WHERE site_id::text = '$site' AND bacnet_device_id IS NOT NULL AND COALESCE(polling, true) = true ORDER BY bacnet_device_id

list.name: point
list.query: SELECT COALESCE(object_name, external_id) AS __text, external_id AS __value FROM points WHERE site_id::text = '$site' AND bacnet_device_id = '$device' AND COALESCE(polling, true) = true ORDER BY COALESCE(object_name, external_id)
